metadata.title: adidas Men's Climawarm Performance Fleece Pant
features: Adidas Fleece Pant College Navy MD
Men's athletic pants with an elasticated waistband for a comfortable fit
Engineered to help keep you warm in cooler weather conditions
A classic staple for any athlete's wardrobe
description: The Adidas Climawarm Performance Fleece Pant 211B wicks away moisture and has soft fleece inside, with zipper pockets and logo embroidery. Adidas's Climawarm Performance Fleece Pant is made of cotton/polyester.
